detectors.description:
PotFinance._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PotFinance.sol#548-566) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PotFinance.sol#558)
detectors.markdown:
